sheet.name: en
sheet.text: You're supposed to keep things in order, remember?
Hello...
Or should I say "good morning"?
No, no, that's not it.
It should be "nice to meet you."
Whew... I didn't think I'd be so nervous.
But... this is my first friend ever.
I hope everything went okay.
Oh! N-Nice to meet you!
Who... are you?
And... who am I?
Uh, well, let's see...
My name is Marle, and I'm your friend.
Your name is Squares, and you're my friend.
That doesn't exactly answer my question.
But that's everything there is to know.
Then let me ask you this.
What is this place? What is my purpose?
Before I can tell you where we are, we have to do one thing.
Let's test out the powers I've given you.
Powers...?
*gulp* W-Well, here we go.
Are you ready?
R-Ready for what? What's this all about?
It's time for us to battle!
...What was that just now?
*gleeful squeal* We did it!
I was alone for so long...
And it wasn't like I could just go out and meet whoever I wanted.
Battling someone else has been my dream!
*delightful giggle* And now it's finally come true! ♪
And you know something, Squares? You're quite strong!
I'm not like you at all. The opposite, really. And I get lonely too easily.
I always wanted a friend. Someone I could depend on.
And that's exactly what you are, Squares.
I just can't believe it worked! This is so wonderful!
...I'm not sure what this Marle is talking about.
But she seems to be happy.
What is this... warm feeling inside me?
Hey, Squares!
Come take a look at this!
What is it?
These are all the different worlds across time and space.
See, look. There's a round one there.
And a square one there.
Among many, many others.
*enchanted giggle* Don't they all look like fun? ♪
Hm...
Just take a look at all the people who live on these worlds.
They look so happy, they're practically glowing!
That's why I love this place! ♪
Why not visit them instead of just watching them?
I'm afraid that's something we shouldn't do, Squares.
Why not?
Because every world has its own set of rules.
You and I comprehend these worlds in ways that others don't. We have a duty not to intervene.
We mustn't do anything to risk merging the worlds together.
If we did, the rules that make each world unique would get all scrambled together.
Is that so...?
Absolutely! ♪
Ah, forgive me. You haven't existed for very long.
All of this is new to you.
What do you mean? I don't understand.
Case in point. Regardless, I'm satisfied with how things turned out.
After all, I finally made a friend! ♪
You mean me.
That's right! ♪
You know, Squares. All this talk is making me feel...
...Like battling?
Exactly! ♪
What kind of battle should we have today?
I'm fine with whatever.
We have all the time in the universe, don't we?
You've got that right! ♪
Then how about...
An alternating battle between Puyo Puyo and Tetris! ♪
*satisfied sigh* That was so much fun!
I'll beat you next time! ♪
Marle...
Yes?
I think I'm beginning to understand what it is you do.
You are...?
You watch over many different worlds from here.
They go about their existence, and you make sure they're functioning as they should.
You maintain the delicate balance of power.
Right, but... why are you bringing this up now?
Because I want to help you.
You do?
We're friends, aren't we?
Squares...
Whenever I see you happy, it makes me happy, too.
If helping you means seeing you happy more, then that's reason enough for me.
Squares... Thank you!
*chuckle*
Now, let's see...
What can you help with...?
Well, the main things I oversee are what keep the worlds fun and in order.
Fun and order, huh...
Oh, I know! This is what we'll do! ♪
I'll make sure the rules that govern each world are fun.
And you make sure the rules are right and orderly.
How does that sound? ♪
So my job... is to ensure everything is "right"?
Yep! ♪
All right.
Leave it to me.
*giggle* We're going to make a great team! ♪
Squares!
Wh-What? I've never seen anything like this...
What's wrong, Marle?
The Puyo Puyo and Tetris worlds have merged.
Could that be what you're seeing?
I-It is.
Then it's nothing to worry about. I've already taken care of it.
The inhabitants of those worlds were running amok.
But the two worlds have been separated again.
It's like nothing ever happened.
Everything should be "right" now.
That may be, but...
But what?
We can't really say that "it's like nothing ever happened"...
Why not?
Well, you see...
Their memories of these events may have been erased.
But the connection in their hearts is unbreakable.
Even though they're back in their own worlds, their hearts will call out to see each other again.
...That certainly does not sound "right."
I guess, but it DOES sound like a lot of fun, doesn't it? ♪
How?
Because they don't even remember each other, yet there's still a connection between them.
I wonder what it could mean?
*giggle*
It's so mysterious and beautiful! Don't you think?
...No, I don't.
What!?
It's ridiculous. It's chaotic. It's wrong.
It's... not right.
I see.
If you say so, Squares.
I think I need some time alone.
...Hmph.
Then I guess I do, too.
*overthinking sounds*
Why was Marle smiling...?
It was probably nothing. I shouldn't dwell on it.
*secretly humming*
*quietly giggling* ♪
Let's see how everyone's doing today.
Hello there, Puyo Puyo world... How are you today, Tetris world?
*gloomy sigh* It's such a shame.
I never thought I'd have to watch over the worlds in secret...
Squares can't find out about this.
Find out about what?
Eek!
N-Nothing! Nothing at all.
Say, Squares!
Why don't we have another battle today?
Just you and me?
What?
Yes, of course.
You and I are the only ones here, after all.
Hm.
Okay, let's get started!
Ow...
Squares... Are you upset about something?
...Yes, Marle. I am.
You aren't happy around me anymore. I can't even remember the last time you smiled.
What!?
That's not true!
You've been obsessing over those two worlds ever since they merged.
*gasp*
All you can think about is what it must be like to battle there.
Or maybe how "fun" it would be to engage with their inhabitants.
No, not at all!
Say what you want, but I know the truth.
You created me, after all.
Trust me. I know.
...Squares, I'm sorry.
But they're just thoughts! Nothing more.
I pity you, Marle.
But don't worry. I'll take care of this.
What are you going to do...?
Your obsession with these worlds needs to stop.
They've stolen all your attention and put order at risk.
That's why I'm going straight to them myself.
What!?
N-No! You can't do that!
You know better than that!
My duty is to place what's right above all else.
And I believe more than anything that this is the right thing to do.
You do...?
But why?
I'm not done.
As for the two worlds...
...you and I will merge them once again.
We'll locate these flawed bonds—these conflicts.
And we'll erase them from existence.
Excuse me!?
I don't think I heard you correctly, Squares, but did you just say—
You heard me just fine.
All you have to do is gather power for me. I'll do the actual erasing.
And I'm sure it'll be lots of "fun."
No... I don't want that...
I see.
Then how about this...
Why don't I hold on to your mind for a little while?
No, stop...!
Stop.
Huh!?
Wh-Who are you?
I'm Squares.
I'm the person you become after a lot of people go out of their way to help you.
Fool! Answer me!
I could insist for you to stop all this right here and now.
But the only way I was able to grow was by making mistakes.
It makes it quite difficult to decide what to do with you.
Does that make sense, past me?
I don't know what you're rambling on about.
Just get out of my way!
Don't make me make you.
Oh? I'd like to see you try.
He's gone.
It was just another vision...
A memory of my past regrets.
*sigh*
...So THAT'S what happened.
That WAS a vision of your past, wasn't it?
Who's there!?
You just couldn't let go of Marle, could you?
And now look at you. You have nowhere to go.
Answer me!
I won't ever make the same mistake again! You hear me!?
Squares!
I-It's you.
Come this way! Hurry!
Huh...?
What are you talking about...?
Oh, how ignorant and naive I was.
I think we're in the clear...
Wh-What's going on?
Let go of me!
Sorry, but there was no time to explain.
And I couldn't just leave you there.
Well, can you explain now?
That voice from earlier belonged to the Wanderer of Worlds.
There's still a great deal I don't understand about him.
Now, listen. And listen well.
If the Wanderer deems you to be powerful, he "haunts" you, so to speak.
He then uses your dark past as a weapon to torment you... and he won't stop!
How?
By honing in on any dark deeds you've committed.
He uses them against you! Don't you see how serious this is?
Not really...
Squares, you're going to keep getting these visions.
They won't stop until you free yourself from the Wanderer's grasp.
Dark deeds of my past...
This happened to me before, too.
Except in your case, you became obsessed with Marle.
You two went through a lot together, and it eventually tore you apart.
HEY!
Who are you to say that!?
If that's how you react to hearing the truth, then I feel sorry for you.
The Wanderer of Worlds will play you like a fiddle.
Shut up!
Perhaps a battle will teach you how to close that enormous mouth of yours!
I don't think we have the ti—
I said SHUT UP!
Now, come on!
I beat you!
Now leave!
We're on the same side, in case you've forgotten...
Wahaha! Found you! ♪
Well, this isn't good!
Hey there, Stairs!
It's Squares!
C'mon, don't be like that. Let's be friends~!
I'm a fellow boss-level character who's made plenty of mistakes of his own.
Pleasure to make your acquaintance!
Who is this guy!?
Well...
Don't say I didn't warn you.
Now, I'm going to teach you how to fend off the final boss!
I have no clue what this guy's talking about.
Yeah. You're not the first.
First!
Trying to make everything "right" is just way, way too complicated.
So let's knock that off, shall we?
...I'm going to punch him.
P-Patience!
Now let's try to stay calm.
Personally, I think you could've handled things with a little more panache.
For example, starting a circus or opening an amusement park...
Ooh! Maybe even creating another world!
What are you even saying?
You no longer have it now, but you once possessed a great power.
It was something so incredible and almighty...
...you could've done anything you wanted with it.
Ecolo!
Oops. Did I say too much?
We both know Squares is still young.
It's not right to teach him such outlandish concepts yet.
Geez, you're always soooo overprotective.
Don't go twisting my intentions around.
If you really want to stop me...
...then YOU have to entertain me instead!
I figured it would come to this...
*hysterical laughter*
Listen, Ecolo.
I know this is all just fun and games to you.
But don't pull anything reckless around Squares, understand?
Now why would you say something like that?
The only reason we came here was to help unravel this kid's tangled heart!
What do you mean "we"?
Isn't that right, Dark Prince? ♪
Why must you go and spoil the surprise!?
Wait... You, too!?
What's going on?
Looks like I've been missing out on all the fun.
Eh, not really!
This place is pretty lousy, I've gotta say!
*disappointment*
You there. Squares, was it?
What's it to you?
It seems you're feeling quite guilty about what you did.
And?
Marle and my sweet Arly showed you kindness, and they forgave you.
But you haven't forgiven yourself.
That's why you keep having your visions.
...Is that really why?
Without a doubt.
Ah, I see now.
Look, Squares.
It's hard to forgive ourselves for the choices we made when we were different people.
Especially when you think back on how badly you wanted those things at the time.
But never forget how far you've come.
And don't try to bury the past.
I don't have to... undo my past?
Nobody can undo the past.
As long as you live, you'll always have a past.
Let me share something with you, Squares.
There always comes a time when someone appears who seeks absolute control.
And it doesn't matter if they're trying to conquer a village or an entire world.
It always comes down to the same reason.
The selfish heart of a single person.
Are YOU of all people really say— Mrrgh!
Ecolo.
Quiet down for a bit.
Mrrrrffgghh!
As I was saying... At the end of the day, everything worked out for the better.
Keep walking.
Keep growing.
Give it some time, and you'll figure out your next moves.
I understand!
HA!
Then let's end this heartfelt moment with a battle!
Well, that about does it.
I'll be taking my leave now. Ta-ta!
Oh, I guess it's buh-bye for me, too!
I'll be back, and I'll only be half as much trouble next time! ♪
Well...
It won't be an easy road ahead. If you ever need anything, just say the word.
Take care now.
Yeah. You, too.
Hmm...
I wonder...
They didn't come by just to cheer me up, did they?
*chuckle* Yeah, right.
